__TOC__

These are notes and links for an On Air session introducing the DesktopTeam and how to get involved.

=== How to Get Involved ===

Upstreaming bugs (little knowledge required)
* Information on how and and why: <nowiki>[[Bugs-Upstream]]</nowiki>
* All desktop bugs: https://bugs.launchpad.net/~desktop-bugs

Fixing Bugs (small coding knowledge required)
* Bitesize bugs: http://harvest.ubuntu.com/opportunities/?pkg.set=ubuntu-desktop&opp.list=bitesize
* Bugs in general: http://status.qa.ubuntu.com/reports/ubuntu-desktop/

Packaging New Versions (packaging knowledge required)
* http://people.canonical.com/~platform/desktop/versions.html
* http://summit.ubuntu.com/uds-r/meeting/21314/get-started-with-ubuntu-development/

Keep in Contact
* Weekly meetings in #ubuntu-desktop @ 15:30 UTC
* Mailing list: ubuntu-desktop@lists.ubuntu.com
* UDS sessions: http://summit.ubuntu.com/uds-r/track/desktop/

GNOME 3 (GNOME Remix project)
* Plenty of universe packages to work on
* Plenty of shared packages with the Desktop image
* https://launchpad.net/~gnome3-team/+archive/gnome3
* Talk to jbicha
